moreBlocks.articles:
• d'Oliveira & Associates opens office in Woonsocket, RI, Personal Injury Blog, November 1, 2014
    d’Oliveira & Associates’ new Woonsocket, RI Personal Injury Law Office is located at 62 Hamlet Avenue, Woonsocket, RI 02895. The move will enable the Firm to maintain closer contact with its clients in the Woonsocket, RI area.
  • Taunton Slip and Fall Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured from a slip and fall accident, you may be able to receive a cash settlement for your medical bills, lost income and pain and suffering, among other losses.
  • Massachusetts Social Security Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you are unable to do any type of work for at least 12 months, you may be entitled to collect SSD benefits. Our experienced Social Security Disability lawyers have been winning these cases for disabled people in MA for over 28 years now.
  • Taunton Motorcycle Accident Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured in a motorcycle accident, you may be entitled to compensation for your medical bills, lost income and pain and suffering, among other losses.
  • Taunton Workers’ Compensation Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured while working in Taunton, you may be entitled to workers’ compensation benefits for your lost wages, medical bills, job retraining and in some cases, a lump sum settlement, among other losses.

description:
Top-Notch Injury Attorneys In Taunton

At the law firm of d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. in Taunton, Massachusetts, we concentrate our practice solely on personal injury, Social Security Disability and workers' compensation law. Since this is all we focus on, we are able to provide a level of service unmatched by our competitors, leading to our reputation as one of the top personal injury and disability practices in the region.

Whether you were hurt in an accident that was not your fault or suffered a debilitating injury at work, you can trust the attorneys at our law firm to deliver the personalized attention your case deserves to help you get the maximum amount possible for the losses you sustained.

Serving Our Community For Over 30 Years

Every lawyer at our firm has an extensive amount of experience dealing with injury claims, and our law firm has served the residents of our community for the past 28 years. With such experience on your side, you can rest assured your case will be handled by an attorney who possesses the skills and resources necessary to help you get the money you need.

Over the course of our history, our law firm has secured more than $200 million on behalf of our clients, and we are proud to have a 95 percent success rate of settling cases outside of court. This means we have a long history of acquiring settlements as quickly as possible for those in need.

Discuss Your Need For Free And Pay No Money Upfront

To receive a free telephone or online consultation about your case, you can contact d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. or visit our website. Our law firm offers a no-fee guarantee, so we will not require a fee from you unless we obtain a settlement on your behalf.
